## Estimates of M

1. Arctic Charr: 12 estimates, median is 0.18, mean is 0.181
1. Black Crappie: 6 estimates, median is 0.55, mean is 0.577

## Estimates of A
1. Northern Pike: `r 1-exp(-(0.4))` 
1. Arctic Charr: `r 1-exp(-(0.181+0.1))`
1. Black Crappie: `r 1-exp(-(0.577+0.6))`
